title: Parcel Boundary Shapefiles
description: Digital shapefiles outlining property parcel boundaries.
howToSteps: Submit a FOIA request to the county GIS department specifying parcel boundary shapefiles in your desired projection.
Ask for accompanying metadata and data dictionary where available.
notes: Many jurisdictions provide parcels as open data; confirm licensing or fees before submitting.

title: Zoning District Map
description: Polygon dataset delineating local zoning districts and classifications.
howToSteps: Request the most recent zoning district dataset from the planning department.
Specify that the data should include zone codes and descriptions.
notes: Zoning layers are frequently updated; confirm the publication date of the dataset.

title: Address Point Database
description: Point dataset containing geocoded address locations.
howToSteps: File a request with the E911 addressing office for the full address point database.
Clarify preferred file format such as CSV or shapefile.
notes: Some regions restrict release of sensitive address information; verify any privacy limitations.

title: Recent Aerial Imagery
description: Latest available orthophotography for the area of interest.
howToSteps: Contact the state GIS agency to request recent aerial imagery tiles or mosaics.
Include geographic extent and resolution requirements in the request.
notes: High-resolution imagery may involve large file transfers; inquire about delivery methods.
